heading: Today, New Years Day
text: Morning snow from western VT east, up to an inch, then increasing periods of sun, last northeast. Blustery and quite cold. Temperatures steady or falling through the teens, to the single numbers north, and from the 20s to the teens south. Winds becoming northwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clearing this evening, then some clouds developing through NY into western VT. Quite cold. Lows zero to 10 below north, teens below in the cold spots, and from 5 below to 5 above south. Winds northwest near 10 mph, becoming light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Sunshine, mixed with clouds. Continued cold. Highs from the low teens to low 20s north to south. Winds west near 10 mph.
